metadata.title: CVE-2021-28163 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse Jetty 9.4.32 to 9.4.38, 10.0.0.beta2 to 10.0.1, and 11.0.0.beta2to 11.0.1, if a user uses a webapps directory that is a symlink, thecontents of the webapps directory is deployed as a static webapp,inadvertently serving the webapps themselves and anything else that mightbe in that directory.

criterions.comment: equinox-bundles: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
